column1: #Text=It is a beautiful old historic city , with a population of almost 80,000 .
#Text=The ancient Nitra , ruled by mighty kings and princes once in the past , is nowadays a modern centre of culture and economy in western Slovakia .

#Text=Thanks to its dynamic cultural life , you can meet here a number of artists from the field of theatre , creative arts , modern or classical music and experience the unforgettable feeling of the present cultural spirit .
#Text=Events like Theatre Festival of Nitra , Fascine Carnival , Academic Nitra , Cultural Summer in Nitra or various music festivals will lead you into the world of culture , world of experience .
#Text=The amount of precious well-preserved buildings and statues builds up the unique colouring of the city with a breath of nostalgia .
#Text=On the other hand , the hotels with latest equipment and restaurants offering the wide scale of home and international cuisine will convince you about the traditional Slovak hospitality .
#Text=The is situated in the city center , near the and has a regional importance .
#Text=Buses connect Nitra with other cities , also foreign .
#Text=The best connection from the capital city , Bratislava is by bus links called " Žltý expres " ( Yellow express ) .
#Text=There are several different bus companies which travel from Bratislava to Nitra ( some of which end in Nitra , many of which go further inland ) .

#Text=It is also possible to travel from Bratislava to Nitra by train , but this will entail changing trains at least once ( e. g. in Nové Zámky or Leopoldov ) and will generally take longer and be more expensive than taking the bus .
#Text=You may also have to wait quite a while when you change trains as the schedules from Bratislava to e.g. Nové Zámky are not well synchronised with those of the local train from there to Nitra .
#Text=Nitra has a very good public transport .
#Text=Buses run between each town , city center and tourist attractive places .
#Text=There are many Taxi services like CD-TAXI , MOJE TAXI , CITY TAXI , TAXI OK and WFR TAXI .
#Text=The castle ( Hrad ) is in the old town .
#Text=Peter and Paul Church and Monastery of the Franciscan
#Text=Nitra has many elementary and high schools and two universities - Slovak University of Agriculture and University of Constantine , the Philosopher .
#Text=There are many restaurants situated in all parts of city .
#Text=Many of them are in the center .
#Text=There are also two McDonald 's , first in shopping center " Mlyny " and second near shopping center " Galéria " in which is also TESCO .
#Text=Nitra is a very safe city , there is a city police , which ensures the safety also at night .
#Text=From Nitra you can choose a many following places or cities .
#Text=To beautiful Bojnice ( part of the city Prievidza ) you can use train connection .
#Text=To the lovely spa town Piešťany or capital city Bratislava you can use buses .
